document.full_text: japan's toshiba corp said on thursday it expects its operations to recover in the second half of this financial year after being hit by supply chain disruptions in the wake of the march 11 earthquake and tsunami.
document.title: toshiba ceo plans to overcome supply chain woes in h2
lines_and_colors: japan's toshiba corp said on thursday it expects its operations to recover in the second half of this financial year after being hit by supply chain disruptions in the wake of the march 11 earthquake and tsunami.
